name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Developer Engineer with 10+ years of experience in backend development, proficient in delivering robust Web APIs and scalable solutions using **.NET**, **C#**, **SQL**, **PostgreSQL**, **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **NestJS**, and **React**. Skilled in cloud services such as **AWS** and software development methodologies including **Agile** and **DevOps**. Expert in implementing CI/CD pipelines and automated testing to enhance development processes. Proven success in high-impact projects within notable organizations, demonstrating adaptability and a commitment to excellence.

experience.responsibilities:
Engineered backend services in **C#** using **.NET** and **Web API** to streamline application development and integrate modern frameworks like **Angular** and **React**.
Developed event-driven solutions utilizing **SQL** and **PostgreSQL** for effective data management, processing client requests with a focus on performance and reliability.
Deployed microservices architecture using **AWS** services, leveraging **CI/CD** strategies to enhance deployment efficiency, achieving a deployment frequency of **9 times** per week.
Implemented automated testing frameworks to improve code quality and reduce manual testing efforts by **30%**, increasing overall delivery speed.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Agile** methodologies to ensure the timely completion of project milestones and alignment with business objectives, contributing to a **15%** increase in project success rates.
Led the integration of new technologies and frameworks such as **TypeScript** and **NestJS** to drive innovation in development practices, enhancing application performance and maintainability.
Executed database optimizations in **PostgreSQL**, resulting in a **20%** reduction in query response times while ensuring data integrity across various stages of development.

Utilized **.NET** and **C#** to develop robust backend systems, ensuring high performance and scalability for applications.
Engineered and optimized RESTful **Web API** services to facilitate seamless integration with frontend frameworks like **Angular** and **React**.
Designed and maintained databases with **SQL** and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring efficient data retrieval and storage for operational systems.
Implemented **DevOps** practices and CI/CD pipelines to automate deployments, increasing release efficiency by **30%**.
Collaborated in an **Agile** environment, participating in sprint planning and retrospectives to continuously improve team performance.
Conducted automated testing to enhance software quality and reliability, reducing bug rates by **25%** over **6 months**.
Managed system architecture and integration with external services on **AWS**, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance in production deployments.
Led efforts to ensure that all applications met security standards, integrating OAuth2 for authentication and securing APIs.
Mentored junior developers in coding practices and effective use of technologies such as **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, and **VB.NET**.

Integrated backend services using **.NET** and **C#** for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, ensuring efficient trading operations.
Designed and implemented databases using **SQL** and **PostgreSQL**, enhancing data management for over **10,000** user accounts.
Engineered real-time price feed processors while leveraging **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React**, achieving a latency reduction of **20%** in transaction processing times.
Collaborated with frontend teams to architect and deliver responsive data through **Web API**, ensuring a seamless interaction experience for over **500** users concurrently.
Ensured compliance with industry standards, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while maintaining stringent data security protocols on all development projects.
Implemented automated testing frameworks using **CI/CD** principles with tools such as **PyTest** and **tox**, leading to a **30%** reduction in post-deployment errors.
Optimized backend task execution through job queuing solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, improving process management and efficiency for real-time data processing.

skills:

	C#, .NET, VB.NET, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python (3.8+), SQL, Bash

	NestJS, FastAPI, Flask, Django, Celery

**Frontend Frameworks**
	React, Angular

	Web API, REST/gRPC APIs, Microservices

	AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda)

	PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis

	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, CI/CD, DevOps, Agile, automated testing

	Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Airflow, MLflow, Kafka, PyTest, Git
